result.markdown:
---
title: "vdvd"
---



## Regressão

### Pacotes usados

::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_6f6221e0b1dfc2db721b38dd1076bea2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)
library(tidyverse)
library(AgroR)
library(r4pde)
library(broom)
library(patchwork)
```
:::


### Importar dados


::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_a7e11f020b89525ba1a3d34bfeaa2a6f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
estande <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=401662555")
```
:::


### Visualizar


::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_0a887e882308eab76c3cbddb8828b524'}

```{.r .cell-code}
estande |>
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, color = "darkgrey")+
  facet_wrap(~ exp)+
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", size = 0.5, color = "darkblue")+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = T)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### regressão experimento 1


::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_a52ac419c07e2529bcb411e3ee6a829e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp1 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 1)

exp1 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  ylim(0,100)+
  geom_smooth(se = F)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#modelo linear
lm1<- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp1)
summary(lm1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp1)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-25.500  -6.532   1.758   8.573  27.226 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  52.5000     4.2044  12.487 1.84e-11 ***
trat         -0.2419     0.1859  -1.301    0.207    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 15 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.07148,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.02928 
F-statistic: 1.694 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.2066
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
anova(lm1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: nplants
          Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F)
trat       1  381.0  381.05  1.6937 0.2066
Residuals 22 4949.5  224.98               
```
:::
:::


Experimento 2


::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_db46a7920622285cbb7b4bc2cf4f9692'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp2 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 2)

exp2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  ylim(0,100)+
  geom_smooth(se = F, method = "lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#modelo linear
lm2<- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)
summary(lm2)
```

```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-25.7816  -7.7150   0.5653   8.1929  19.2184 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  60.9857     3.6304  16.798 4.93e-14 ***
trat         -0.7007     0.1605  -4.365 0.000247 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.95 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.4641,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4398 
F-statistic: 19.05 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.0002473
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
anova(lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: nplants
          Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
trat       1 3196.2  3196.2  19.054 0.0002473 ***
Residuals 22 3690.4   167.7                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::


Experimento 3


::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_23703bd3223b05c44f40e570f0088a12'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp3 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 3)

exp3 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  ylim(0,100)+
  geom_smooth(se = F, method = "lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#modelo linear
lm3<- lm(nplants ~ trat, data = exp3)
summary(lm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp3)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-26.5887  -3.9597   0.7177   5.5806  19.8952 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  95.7500     2.9529  32.425  < 2e-16 ***
trat         -0.7634     0.1306  -5.847 6.97e-06 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 10.53 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.6085,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.5907 
F-statistic: 34.19 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 6.968e-06
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
anova(lm3)
```

```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: nplants
          Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
trat       1 3794.3  3794.3  34.189 6.968e-06 ***
Residuals 22 2441.5   111.0                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hist(residuals(lm3))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Comparação de modelos GLM com Galssian e Poisson

quanto menor o AIC melhor


::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_5167b188b6a811c80b3b82b1eb908222'}

```{.r .cell-code}
glm1 <- glm(nplants ~ trat, family = "gaussian", data =  exp1)
glm1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:  glm(formula = nplants ~ trat, family = "gaussian", data = exp1)

Coefficients:
(Intercept)         trat  
    52.5000      -0.2419  

Degrees of Freedom: 23 Total (i.e. Null);  22 Residual
Null Deviance:	    5330 
Residual Deviance: 4949 	AIC: 202
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(glm1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
glm(formula = nplants ~ trat, family = "gaussian", data = exp1)

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  52.5000     4.2044  12.487 1.84e-11 ***
trat         -0.2419     0.1859  -1.301    0.207    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for gaussian family taken to be 224.9751)

    Null deviance: 5330.5  on 23  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 4949.5  on 22  degrees of freedom
AIC: 202

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 2
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(glm1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 202.0045
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
glm1b <- glm(nplants ~trat, family = poisson(link = "log"), data = exp1)
summary(glm1b)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
glm(formula = nplants ~ trat, family = poisson(link = "log"), 
    data = exp1)

Coefficients:
             Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
(Intercept)  3.963738   0.039359 100.708  < 2e-16 ***
trat        -0.005199   0.001862  -2.793  0.00523 ** 
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

(Dispersion parameter for poisson family taken to be 1)

    Null deviance: 111.37  on 23  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 103.31  on 22  degrees of freedom
AIC: 243.58

Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(glm1b)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 243.5839
```
:::
:::

### ajuste de modelo linear e quadrático


::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_2e63264e4983696a6681deef5c3a3ffe'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp2 <- estande |> 
  filter(exp == 2)

#modelo quadratico
exp2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, nplants))+
  geom_point()+
  ylim(0,100)+
  geom_smooth(se = F,
              method = "lm",
              formula = y ~ poly(x,2))+
  geom_smooth( method = "lm",
               se = F, 
               color = "black")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#modelo linear
lm2<- lm(nplants ~ trat, 
         data = exp2)
summary(lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat, data = exp2)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-25.7816  -7.7150   0.5653   8.1929  19.2184 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  60.9857     3.6304  16.798 4.93e-14 ***
trat         -0.7007     0.1605  -4.365 0.000247 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.95 on 22 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.4641,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4398 
F-statistic: 19.05 on 1 and 22 DF,  p-value: 0.0002473
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
anova(lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Analysis of Variance Table

Response: nplants
          Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value    Pr(>F)    
trat       1 3196.2  3196.2  19.054 0.0002473 ***
Residuals 22 3690.4   167.7                      
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_ade240f62ffd1458218a6a2700233c05'}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp2$trat2 <- exp2$trat^2

#primeira ordem
exp2$trat2 <- exp2$trat^2


# segunda ordem ou quadratico
lm3<- lm(nplants ~trat + trat2,
         data = exp2)
summary(lm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = nplants ~ trat + trat2, data = exp2)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-25.439  -6.019   1.789   8.016  19.561 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 66.30156    4.42097  14.997 1.08e-12 ***
trat        -1.77720    0.58467  -3.040  0.00623 ** 
trat2        0.02223    0.01166   1.906  0.07036 .  
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 12.24 on 21 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.5432,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.4997 
F-statistic: 12.49 on 2 and 21 DF,  p-value: 0.0002675
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#o r2 aumentou, explicando MELHOR. 50% DA VARIAÇÃO
AIC(lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 194.9597
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
AIC(lm3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 193.1284
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#o modelo quadratico explica melhor

#a equação olha no summary
#y=66,3 - 1,77*TRAT+0,02*TRAT^2

library(AgroR)
#linear
with(exp2, polynomial(trat, nplants, grau = 1))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

----------------------------------------------------
Regression Models
----------------------------------------------------
              Estimate Std. Error   t value     Pr(>|t|)
(Intercept) 60.9857143  3.6304377 16.798447 4.929311e-14
trat        -0.7006912  0.1605226 -4.365063 2.473272e-04

----------------------------------------------------
Deviations from regression
----------------------------------------------------
          Df      SSq       MSQ        F      p-value
Linear     1 3196.203 3196.2031 21.82329 0.0001899378
Deviation  4 1054.172  263.5430  1.79944 0.1729687460
Residual  18 2636.250  146.4583                      
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[[1]]
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#quadratico (explicou melhor)
with(exp2, polynomial(trat, nplants, grau = 2))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

----------------------------------------------------
Regression Models
----------------------------------------------------
               Estimate Std. Error   t value     Pr(>|t|)
(Intercept) 66.30156250 4.42096799 14.997069 1.079972e-12
trat        -1.77719814 0.58467380 -3.039640 6.230050e-03
I(trat^2)    0.02222876 0.01165948  1.906496 7.036247e-02

----------------------------------------------------
Deviations from regression
----------------------------------------------------
          Df       SSq       MSQ         F      p-value
Linear     1 3196.2031 3196.2031 21.823293 0.0001899378
Quadratic  1  544.5029  544.5029  3.717801 0.0697619482
Deviation  3  509.6690  169.8897  1.159986 0.3523240106
Residual  18 2636.2500  146.4583                       
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[[1]]
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# cubica
# normalmente não utiliza
with(exp2, polynomial(trat, nplants, grau = 3))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

----------------------------------------------------
Regression Models
----------------------------------------------------
                Estimate  Std. Error   t value     Pr(>|t|)

----------------------------------------------------
```

```{.r .cell-code}
wm <- WhiteMoldSoybean
wm |>
  ggplot(aes(inc, yld))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~ study)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](REGRESSÃO_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
 wm |> 
  ggplot(aes(inc, yld, group = factor(study)))+
  geom_point()+
  #facet_wrap(~ study)+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = F)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
  #primeiro  
mofo1 <- lm(yld ~ inc, data = wm)
summary(mofo1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = yld ~ inc, data = wm)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-1657.85  -594.50   -91.32   531.76  1693.15 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 3299.619     56.451  58.451  < 2e-16 ***
inc           -9.261      2.108  -4.393 1.45e-05 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 745.8 on 380 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.04833,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.04582 
F-statistic:  19.3 on 1 and 380 DF,  p-value: 1.452e-05
```

```{.r .cell-code}
#quanto de produtividade ta perdendo pra cada percentual? -9.261 kg
```

::: {.cell hash='REGRESSÃO_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_0a8eaaf057827819807d1cda182e124c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
#segundo
mofo2 <- wm |> 
  group_by(study) |> 
  do (tidy(lm(.$yld ~ .$inc), conf.int = TRUE))
mofo2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 70 × 8
```

:::

```{.r .cell-code}
p3 <- mofo2 |> 
  filter(term == "(Intercept)") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = estimate))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 8, color = "white", fill = "gray50")+
  theme_r4pde()+
  labs(x = "Intercept", y = "Frequency")

p4 <- mofo2 |> 
  filter(term == ".$inc") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = estimate))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 8, color = "white", fill = "gray50")+
  theme_r4pde()+
  labs(x = "Slope", y = "Frequency")



p3|p4
```

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- mofo2 %>% 
  filter(term == ".$inc")
mean(df$estimate)
```
